issue.title: Client fails to connect to the server because the server begins to listen only later

content.raw:
> You can start the client before or after the server is started.

I traced the kernel calls, client attempts to connect and fails because nobody is listening.

> The connection between the two is handled for you.

How? The client doesn't seem to try to connect again.
content.html:
You can start the client before or after the server is started.

I traced the kernel calls, client attempts to connect and fails because nobody is listening.

The connection between the two is handled for you.

How? The client doesn't seem to try to connect again.
